title: Latest Ladbrokes font
content:
Does anyone know this one?

Thanks in advance.  
R

comments.content: Looks like [DIN Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018072905/http:/myfonts.us/td-Mdy9LF) (Italic) with some corners rounded.
Thanks Ryuk — probably a custom job.
